StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_MICheckMedicalExamDate]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @MedicalExamDate date.me AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @FoundExam int
DECLARE @TranType varchar(8) DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100) DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_MEDICAL_EXAM CME WHERE CME.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND CME.MEDICAL_EXAM_DATE = @MedicalExamDate) BEGIN SET @FoundExam = 1 END ELSE BEGIN SET @FoundExam = 0 END
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the medical exam record.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) END
RETURN @FoundExam
SET NOCOUNT OFF
